fighting-style.name: Fighting Style
fighting-style.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty.

archery.name: Archery
archery.description: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls you make with ranged weapons.

dueling.name: Dueling
dueling.description: When you are wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with that weapon.

second-wind.name: Second Wind
second-wind.description: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 plus your fighter level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.
